response.overview: Buenos Aires, 1975. Exiled Uruguayan militants hold a clandestine congress. Their goal is to form a party that will return to Uruguay and reorganize the resistance against the dictatorship of Juan María Bordaberry. The so-called "Alexandra Campaign" will establish contact with hundreds of Uruguayans and will become one of the milestones of the continent's anti-dictatorial resistance.
response.title: Kollontai, apuntes de resistencia
